Ragnar followed her as he could, but he was soon lagging behind as the
reactor in the mech he had morphed into produced only limited power
for movement.

He called at maximal base.

Ragnar: Base, this is Ragnar. I am escorting a "guest" that is coming
your way. She says she's a decepticon and she is quite... unpleasant.
Can someone welcome her, quiaff?

Blackfang received the message and replied.

Blackfang: Aff, Big Guy. Blackfang here, I'll greet her home. Over.

The wolf bot stood and went at the base's entrance. He would see her
when she showed up. Until then, shields were up.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Stacy <EmprzAnastazia@a...>"
<EmprzAnastazia@a...> wrote:
> 
> > Ragnar responded coolly.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Anout Ten klicks northwest. There is a clearing in that
> > direction. The base is there.
> > 
> 
> She broke out in a run in her feline form. She wasn't about to waste 
> any time getting there. The sooner she got there, the better she was 
> rid of this pathetic fleshling.
> 
> Racing towards the direction that Ragnar had indicated.
